statements: SELECT id, click_through_rate, conversions FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE content_id = 1
SELECT * FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5
SELECT id, content_id, click_through_rate, conversions FROM content_performance_metrics ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC
SELECT content_id, click_through_rate FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate < 0.2
SELECT AVG(conversions) AS average_conversions FROM content_performance_metrics
SELECT id, content_id, click_through_rate FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC
SELECT content_id, click_through_rate, conversions FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE content_id = 5 ORDER BY conversions ASC
SELECT id, conversions FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate >= 0.5 AND conversions IS NOT NULL
SELECT content_id, click_through_rate FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate < 0.2 ORDER BY content_id DESC
SELECT * FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM content_performance_metrics;
SELECT content_name, conversions, click_through_rate FROM content_performance_metrics;
SELECT id, content_name FROM content_performance_metrics ORDER BY content_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type='like' AND user_id=123;
SELECT content_name, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE content_id=456 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content_name, click_through_rate FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 5;
SELECT content_name, conversions FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE conversions BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT id, content_name FROM content_performance_metrics ORDER BY content_name DESC;
SELECT content_name, click_through_rate, conversions FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 8 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC, conversions ASC;
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE id = 1
SELECT date, impressions FROM click_through_rates ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, clicks FROM click_through_rates WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT content_id, click_through_rate FROM content_performance ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC
SELECT id, conversions, revenue FROM conversions WHERE conversions >= 5
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY clicks DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM conversions WHERE revenue > 10000 AND date <= '2022-05-31';
SELECT content_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM content_performance WHERE click_through_rate >= 0.05 ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT id, impressions FROM click_through_rates WHERE impressions BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM conversions WHERE conversions >= 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM content_performance_metrics;
SELECT content_title, click_through_rate FROM content_performance_metrics ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT id, content_title, conversions FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(impressions) as total_impressions FROM ad_performance_metrics GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(total_revenue) as avg_revenue FROM campaign_metrics WHERE total_conversions > 100;
SELECT * FROM content_performance_metrics ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC, content_title ASC
SELECT content_title, click_through_rate FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 100 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC
SELECT content_title, click_through_rate, conversions FROM content_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY conversions DESC
SELECT ad_id, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000 AND clicks < 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT campaign_id, total_conversions, total_revenue FROM campaign_metrics WHERE total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC, total_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM ContentMetrics;
SELECT content_id, clicks FROM ContentMetrics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT content_id, conversion_date FROM Conversions ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM Devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' OR device_type = 'Tablet' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ContentMetrics WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT conversion_type, conversion_value FROM Conversions WHERE conversion_date >= '2022-01-01' AND conversion_value > 100 ORDER BY conversion_value DESC
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE username ILIKE '%john%' AND email NOT ILIKE '%example.com'
SELECT device_name, COUNT(device_id) AS device_count FROM Devices GROUP BY device_name ORDER BY device_count DESC

SELECT c.content_id, c.clicks, co.conversion_type FROM ContentMetrics c JOIN Conversions co ON c.content_id = co.content_id WHERE c.clicks > 50 AND co.conversion_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY c.clicks DESC
